configuration.name: PASSWORD_EXPIRY_IN_DAYS
configuration.label: Password Expiry In Days
configuration.description: The number of days a password is valid before it is considered expired and must be reset.

configuration.name: ENABLED_CONNECTIONS
configuration.label: Enabled Connections
configuration.description: If you wish to restrict this behavior to certain Database connections, please provide a comma-delimited list (no spaces) of the connection IDs you wish to enforce this policy on.  You can also leave this empty to enforce on all Database connections.

configuration.name: ENABLED_ORGANIZATIONS
configuration.label: Enabled Organizations
configuration.description: If you wish to restrict this behavior to certain Organizations, provide a comma-delimited list (no spaces) of the organization IDs you wish to enforce this policy on. You can also leave this empty to enforce on all Organizations.

configuration.name: ERROR_MESSAGE
configuration.label: Error Message
configuration.description: The error code/message returned to the client when they attempt to use an expired password.
configuration.default_value: Your password has expired.  Please reset it.
